hero.title: The Sweetest Form of Happiness
hero.description: We have been delighting children and adults with our delicious jelly candies produced since 2010.

nevijel.name: Nevijel
nevijel.description: Our flagship soft jelly candy of premium quality. Nevijel, our main product, is a quality and delicious option we've been producing since 2010.

gummyBears.name: Gummy Bears
gummyBears.description: Colorful and delicious bear-shaped candies that children love. This product, which is in the development phase, will be on our shelves very soon.

fruitRings.name: Fruit Rings
fruitRings.description: Our ring-shaped candies with natural fruit flavors. This delicious category, which is in our new product development process, will be with you very soon.

quality.title: Leaders in Quality and Safety
quality.paragraph1: Since 2010, we have been one of the leading companies in the production of quality jelly candies. We produce in our modern facility to the highest hygiene standards.
quality.paragraph2: All our products are produced in accordance with the Turkish Food Codex and international standards and undergo regular quality controls.
quality.paragraph3: Our mission is to provide safe, quality, and delicious products for children and adults. Our vision is to be the leading brand in Turkey's jelly candy industry.

footer.address: Çumra Organized Industrial Zone, Çumra/Konya - Turkey
footer.description: We produce quality jelly candies with over 15 years of experience.
